title: Amazon ASIN Extraction
snippet:
We are looking for a program that can extract ASIN information from Amazon with the following criteria.

Buy Box price greater than $10
Sales Rank under 30,000
Number of offers between 3 and 15
Amazon does not have the Buy Box (if that is not possible, Amazon is not a seller)

Results should be returned in excel or csv with the following fields.

ASIN
Amazon Title
Sales Rank
Number of Sellers
Number of FBA sellers within 2% within the Buy Box price
Amazon Buy Box Price
Amazon link
Keepa Link (if possible) Keepa.com

Please provide a time/cost estimate.
If possible, please submit a sample for review.
